SELECT sum(duration) as s_duration, s.id_session as s_id, s.id_user as u_id, theme, date_session, isModel, description, start_recording, status_session FROM session_users su, sessions s, activities a WHERE su.id_user = #value# AND su.id_session = s.id_session AND s.id_session = a.id_session GROUP BY s.id_session
SELECT DISTINCT CAST(s.date_session AS DATE) FROM session_users su, sessions s WHERE s.id_session = su.id_session AND su.id_user = #value:INTEGER# ORDER BY s.date_session
SELECT DISTINCT CAST(s.date_session AS DATE) FROM sessions s ORDER BY s.date_session
